sourcesContent: import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet' import L from 'leaflet' const Icon1 = new L.Icon({ iconUrl: require('@Assets/images/svg/map-marker.png').default, iconRetinaUrl: require('@Assets/images/svg/map-marker.png').default, iconAnchor: [5, 55], popupAnchor: [10, -44], iconSize: [55, 55], shadowSize: [68, 95], shadowAnchor: [20, 92] }) const Icon2 = new L.Icon({ iconUrl: require('@Assets/images/svg/map-marker-3.png').default, iconRetinaUrl: require('@Assets/images/svg/map-marker-3.png').default, iconAnchor: [20, 40], popupAnchor: [0, -35], iconSize: [55, 55], shadowSize: [29, 40], shadowAnchor: [7, 40] }) const MapCustomIcon = () => { const lat = 51.505 const lng = -0.09 const zoom = 15 const position = [lat, lng] const position2 = [51.501, -0.09] return ( Custom Icons This is a popup You're here. ) } export default MapCustomIcon
